docs.lead_paragraph: New York is running ads warning that soft drinks are dangerous to good health. Meanwhile, there are opposing ads charging that the government campaign against soft drinks threatens citizens' freedoms.

headline.main: Fighting for the Right to Drink Soda
headline.print_headline: Fighting for the Right to Drink Soda

docs.snippet: New York is running ads warning that soft drinks are dangerous to good health. Meanwhile, there are opposing ads charging that the government campaign against soft drinks threatens citizens' freedoms.
